participant_1.background:
I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays.
I'm not sure if my family would be accepting of me, but I hope they would be.
i used to be able to run really fast.
My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.
i enjoy playing guitar and video games.

participant_2.background:
I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies.
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
my wife does not like me anymore.
i m applying for publishing jobs.
sometimes i feel like i ve already been through life once before.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing okay. Just got done with a long day of work.
Oh, what kind of work do you do?
I'm a publisher.
Oh cool! I've always been interested in publishing. What do you like most about it?
I love getting to work with authors and helping them get their books out into the world.
That sounds really rewarding.
It is. I love being able to help people share their stories with the world.
That's awesome. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! Me too.
So, what are some of your favorite books?
I have a lot of favorites, but I'd say my top three are "The Great Gatsby," "To Kill a Mockingbird," and "The Catcher in the Rye."
Those are all great books! I've read all of them.
Me too! They're all classics for a reason.
Yeah, they definitely are.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play guitar, video games, and hang out with friends.
Those all sound like fun activities. I like to play guitar too.
Oh, cool! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably blues.
Blues is a great genre. I love the way it feels.
Me too. It's so soulful.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a good rest of your day.
You too! It was nice talking to you as well
